r.s: Fast and Safe little cache system
r.d: This package is a little cache system optimized for file containers. It is fast and safe (because it uses file locking and/or anti-corruption tests).
r.n: Bugs fixed : - 3 unit test files was forgotten in beta1 package.xml New features : - request #6681 : new extendLife() method (thanks to alex at vegagames dot net) - request #6617 : "$this->method()" calls are ok with Cache_Lite_Function without workaround (thanks to thomas dot nicolai at unisg dot ch) - request #6575 : new options 'dontCacheWhenTheOutputContainsNOCACHE', 'dontCacheWhenTheResultIsFalse', 'dontCacheWhenTheResultIsNull' (thanks to thomas dot nicolai at unisg dot ch) - new debug option for Cache_Lite_Function - new test files
